name: candy_world
description: A 3D world of rudimentary, but sharp graphically nature - featuring smooth, glossy shapes in a pastel candy-colored landscape.

scripts.build: npm run build:asc && npm run build:cpp && vite build
scripts.build:cpp: if [ -f ./emsdk/emsdk_env.sh ]; then bash -lc "source ./emsdk/emsdk_env.sh && emcc src/physics.cpp -O3 -s WASM=1 -s STANDALONE_WASM=1 --no-entry -o public/build/physics.wasm"; elif command -v emcc >/dev/null 2>&1; then emcc src/physics.cpp -O3 -s WASM=1 -s STANDALONE_WASM=1 --no-entry -o public/build/physics.wasm; else echo 'emcc not found, skipping C++ wasm build'; fi
